data.title: You CANNOT masturbate publicly in Sweden. The earlier reports were just a mistake in translation.
BP seeks to have Gulf Coast oil spill settlement payments suspended
Brazilian president Rousseff launches tirade against US over NSA surveillance at United Nations
44kg of gold bars worth $2million were loaded onto the plane but when it landed they were missing... Air France in more trouble
4-year-old British boy in Nairobi mall confronts armed terrorist, tells him "You are a bad man." Terrorist begs for forgiveness.
Stephen Fry joins demand to end NSA and GCHQ mass surveillance
Retired British Marine who was having coffee at the mall when the violence broke out rushed in and out of the building 12 times to save around 100 people from the takeover-style massacre
Very big quake (7.8) in Pakistan creates new island! Link to pic included
Untouchable girl raped. Woman police officer intimidates victim into not revealing rapist names
Pope Francis orders excommunication of priest who spoke out against the church's positions on gay marriage and women becoming priests.
